Certara R School is a series of guided lessons for those getting started with R in Pharmacometrics.

---

## Lesson 1: Getting Started

In the following lesson you will learn how to:

* Install R
* Install RStudio (IDE)
* Install RsNLME
  * NLME Engine
  * R Packages
* Run test model

R Packages Used: `Certara.RsNLME`

Click [here](lesson_1.html) to access.
